sub_title: Doing the math for a sustainable future
summary:
I’m a passionate proponent of the use of advanced analytical methods and data science as a key business enabler. Throughout my career, I have supported organisations across a myriad of industries in improving the quality and speed of their decision-making and the optimisation of their businesses processes. 

It’s my ambition to support organisations in the development of the culture, the tools and the skill set that allows them to use data science, analytics and optimisation to continuously improve their performance and work towards a sustainable future.
